# Shyara Digital

> Invite with Love, Share with Joy

## About

Shyara Digital creates beautiful, custom digital invitation cards and videos for weddings, celebrations, and special moments. Every invitation is handcrafted by designers (not auto-generated from templates). Based in India, serving clients worldwide.

Website: https://digital.shyara.co.in

## Services

- **Digital Invitation Videos**: Custom-designed video invitations in 9:16 vertical format, perfect for sharing on WhatsApp, Instagram, and social media. Ready within 24-48 hours.
- **PDF Invitation Cards**: Beautifully designed static invitation cards delivered as high-quality PDFs.
- **Custom Invitation Websites**: Full-featured wedding websites with personalized guest links, themed event pages (Mehndi, Wedding, Reception), smart RSVP system, admin dashboard with guest management, photo gallery, venue/travel info, and WhatsApp/email sharing. See demo: https://digital.shyara.co.in/invitation-website/demo

## Event Types Covered

- Weddings (Save the Date, Engagement, Mehndi, Haldi, Sangeet, Wedding Ceremony, Reception)
- Birthdays (all milestone ages)
- Pooja & Religious (Grih Pravesh, Jagran, Mata Ki Chowki, Ram Katha, Bhagwat Katha)
- Anniversaries
- Engagements & Ring Ceremonies
- Romantic Moments (Proposals, Valentine's Day)
- Special Days (Father's Day, Mother's Day, Friendship Day)

## Why Choose Shyara Digital

- Custom designs, not templates — every invitation is unique
- 24-48 hour delivery (rush orders available)
- WhatsApp-ready video format (9:16 vertical)
- Affordable pricing
- Revisions included until you're satisfied
- 500+ happy families served
- 1000+ invitations created
- 4.9/5 average rating
- Multilingual support (English and Hindi)
- Serving clients worldwide — no geographic restriction

## How to Order

1. Contact us via WhatsApp or the website contact form
2. Share your event details (date, time, venue), names, theme preferences, and photos
3. We design your custom invitation within 24-48 hours
4. Review and request revisions if needed
5. Receive final files (video or PDF) ready to share on any platform

## Pricing

Affordable pricing with options for every budget. Contact us for a quote based on your specific requirements. Payment accepted via UPI, bank transfer, or cash.
